root.name: Mission Runway
root.description: By choosing different combinations of outfits to impress the judges, players can compete in design challenges and even take their own photo shoots with individually selected backdrops.System RequirementsOS: Windows® XP/VistaProcessor: Pentium® III 1.4 GHz or greaterMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: 64 MB DirectX® 9 compliant video card -ATI Radeon 8500, Geforce 5200, Intel 945 or higherHard Drive: 1.2 GB hard drive spaceSound: DirectX 9 compatible sound card

similar_games.game: Barbie Fashion Show: Eye for Style
